tool_description: Validates and cross-references etymological sources, checking reliability, consistency, and scholarly consensus across different references.

word.description: The word whose etymology sources need validation

source_claims.description: Array of etymological claims from different sources

source_names.description: Names of sources corresponding to each claim

validation_strictness.description: Level of validation: lenient, moderate, strict

error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: source_claims and source_names arrays must have equal length.
Too many sources: Limit source_claims to 20 entries maximum.
Invalid validation strictness: Use one of [lenient, moderate, strict].
Empty claims array: Provide at least one etymological claim to validate.
Duplicate sources: Remove duplicate entries from source_names array.
Unknown sources: Some source names are not recognized in the scholarly database.
usage: Provide word, source_claims array, and corresponding source_names. Optionally set validation_strictness to control rigor of cross-referencing.

conflicting_claims.description: Claims that conflict with other sources

validation_summary.description: Summary of validation results and recommendations
